projects.title: Project Alpha: Developer Profile (Old Version)
projects.description: My first web dev project that presents my initial knowlegde of HTML, CSS, JS, and Bootstrap. Explained a bit of who I am, my major, and goals.

projects.title: Project Bravo: Berry Drag-and-Drop Game
projects.description: A browser game that employs JavaScript, DOM manipulation, and gameplay logic to create a game with goal of dropping berries into their matching baskets.

projects.title: Project Charlie: API & JSON Dashboard
projects.description: This was a group assignment that had us practice how to use Fetch API, JSON, and sorting. We learned how to co-collaberate on github

projects.title: Project Delta: Goodreads UI Fix
projects.description: We were assigned to select an app of our choosing and fix a UI/UX issue. I chose Goodreads because any reader will tell you its design is inexcusibly lazy, an ancient my-space page, deteremined to make the app unbearable.

achievements.title: HTML & CSS Coursework
achievements.description: Completed all 14 week coursework for codecademy.

achievements.title: CIS 376: Web Development Portfolio
achievements.description: Completed all four course projects: Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, and Delta.
